# type

**Instance Property**

The type of this element.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: HIDReportType
```

## Discussion

The type of an element is determined by the report that contains it.

See [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDReportType] for more details.
title: type
